import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Col, Row, ListGroup, Image, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import products from "../../products"; import Rating from "./../../components/Rating"; const Product = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((product) => product._id === match.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Price: {product.price}$ Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of stock"} ); }; export default Product;
